lead_paragraph: DURLING--Mary Jeanette, 80, of Montpelier, VT, wife of Douglas Kirtz and first wife of best-selling author James Fixx, passed away peacefully at home on February 4, 2016. Mary raised her four children in Jackson Heights, NY then Riverside, CT and retired from Oberlin College as Assistant Dean of Students. Obituary at: http://www. guareandsons.com/home/. Mary asked for contributions to the Durling Fund at the Community Foundation of Lorain County: http://www. peoplewhocare.org/funds/co mmunity-funds/William-J- and-Flora-Hearn-Durling- Fund. At the convenience of family and friends, there will be a Celebration of Life at Christ Episcopal Church of Montpelier and Christ Episcopal Church of Oberlin. Condolences to Betsy Fixx Gumina, 167 River Road West, Berlin, MA 01503. 1/3
